original: de yi las mchog 'dod na ni //
analyzed: de yi las mchog 'dod na ni //
translated: If one wishes to perform the supreme rite,

original: de yis ming yang smos par bya //
analyzed: de yis ming yang smos par bya //
translated: one should also mention his name.

original: ming ni smos pa de yis ni //
analyzed: ming ni smos pa de yis ni //
translated: By mentioning his name,

original: snyems pa med pa'i 'byung po yang //🔽bkug pa med par myur du ni //
analyzed: snyems pa med pa'i 'byung po yang // bkug pa med par myur du ni //
translated: even the haughty spirits🔽will be shown to be obedient

original: bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ba bstan //
analyzed: bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ba bstan //
translated: and to act in accordance with the command.

original: de ni mi yi 'khor dag tu //
analyzed: de ni mi yi 'khor dag tu //
translated: He will be surrounded by a retinue of humans

original: sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur //
translated: and will perform many magical feats.

original: lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu //
analyzed: lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu //
translated: In particular, he will be surrounded by a retinue of spirits

original: spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur //🔽srog chags mi la sogs rnams kyi //
analyzed: spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur // srog chags mi la sogs rnams kyi //
translated: and will engage in various activities.🔽He will have power over the lives

original: srog la dbang bar des 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog la dbang bar des 'gyur ro //
translated: of humans and other creatures.

original: 'byor par bya ba'i phyir yang rung //
analyzed: 'byor par bya ba'i phyir yang rung //
translated: For the sake of prosperity

original: yang na lus @233b ni gzhig phyir des //
analyzed: yang na lus @233b ni gzhig phyir des //
translated: or even for the sake of destroying the body,

original: ming gis bkug pa'i 'byung po la //
analyzed: ming gis bkug pa'i 'byung po la //
translated: he should summon the spirits by name

original: dga' bzhin bag brkyang smra bar bya //
analyzed: dga' bzhin bag brkyang smra bar bya //
translated: and speak to them with joy and openness.🔽He should order them,🔽“Make your nose very large and very long!”

original: ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis //🔽sna ni shin tu che ba dang // shin tu ring bar byos shig ces //
analyzed: ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis // sna ni shin tu che ba dang // shin tu ring bar byos shig ces //
translated: With these and other names,

original: bsgo na de bzhin byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgo na de bzhin byed par 'gyur //
translated: they will do just that.

original: de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur //
analyzed: de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur //
translated: And likewise change the color of their limbs.

original: ring ba dang ni skam pa dang // ma rungs par ni byos shig ces //
analyzed: ring ba dang ni skam pa dang // ma rungs par ni byos shig ces //
translated: “Make them long, dry, and inhospitable.”

original: bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed //🔽de bzhin rnam pa mang po dang // shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs rnams //
analyzed: bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed // de bzhin rnam pa mang po dang // shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs rnams //
translated: When commanded, they will do just that.🔽In the same way, with many different kinds

original: de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis //
translated: of extremely terrifying things,🔽“Make them peaceful,”

original: 'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur //
translated: and the spirits will play with the adept.🔽Even if they are not desired, they will not be seen

original: mi 'dod na yang mi rnams dang // 'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mi 'dod na yang mi rnams dang // 'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: by many people and spirits.

original: rig sngags 'chang chen bzhin du 'gyur //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang chen bzhin du 'gyur //
translated: They will become like the great vidyādhara.

original: gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu bzlas //
analyzed: gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu bzlas //
translated: Whoever always recites the vidyā

original: lha la yang ni phyag 'tshal zhing //
analyzed: lha la yang ni phyag 'tshal zhing //
translated: and pays homage to the gods,🔽and always

original: rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang //
analyzed: rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang //
translated: to the spirits,

original: kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byed por //
analyzed: kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byed por //
translated: offering them whatever food they desire,

original: de ni lhag par bde 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de ni lhag par bde 'gyur zhing //
translated: will attain supreme bliss

original: tshe yang lhag par bskal par thub //
analyzed: tshe yang lhag par bskal par thub //
translated: and a lifespan of an eon.

original: 'byung po mang po'i rgyal po'i mchog /
analyzed: 'byung po mang po'i rgyal po'i mchog /
translated: The supreme king of many spirits,🔽the chief,

original: gtso bor yang ni 'gyur ba dang // lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang //
analyzed: gtso bor yang ni 'gyur ba dang // lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang //
translated: like the king of gods,

original: rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin //
analyzed: rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin //
translated: This is explained as the condition.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sgrub pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sgrub pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The accomplishment of Vajrāṅkuśī is complete.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni //
translated: In the family of Vajrāṅkuśa,

original: rig sngags don kun grub byed pa //
analyzed: rig sngags don kun grub byed pa //
translated: the knowledge-mantra that accomplishes all aims,

original: lha mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di //
analyzed: lha mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di //
translated: this supreme goddess known as Varadā,

original: sems can rnams kyis bstan par bshad //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis bstan par bshad //
translated: is explained as the teacher of sentient beings.

original: zla ba drug gis @234a *//
analyzed: zla ba drug gis @234a *//
translated: Within six months

original: 'grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'grub 'gyur te //
translated: she will be accomplished,

original: tshig gis don kun byed par bstan //
analyzed: tshig gis don kun byed par bstan //
translated: and is explained as accomplishing all aims with words.

original: rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni //
analyzed: rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni //
translated: Having collected all medicinal herbs,

original: srang gcig nges par gzhag par bya //
analyzed: srang gcig nges par gzhag par bya //
translated: one should definitely set aside one pala.

original: na mo ratna tra ya sya; na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra ya sya; na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels! Homage to Vajrapāṇi!

original: ba ti ba ra ti /
analyzed: ba ti ba ra ti /
translated: Vati varati

original: ku sha samba na ma na se /
analyzed: ku sha samba na ma na se /
translated: Kuśa sambhana manase

original: aa ta ra te /
analyzed: aa ta ra te /
translated: Atarate

original: ba te / ye sam rtse bh'u te /
analyzed: ba te / ye sam rtse bh'u te /
translated: Vate yesamṛṣṭabhūte

original: aatto the / ru pa ti ai smri ma sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aatto the / ru pa ti ai smri ma sv'ah'a /
translated: Attothe rūpati smṛta svāhā.

original: sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung //
analyzed: sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung //
translated: In front of a stūpa containing relics,

original: dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya //
analyzed: dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya //
translated: one should recite the mantra eight hundred times in the three periods of the day.

original: gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis //
analyzed: gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis //
translated: Pure and celibate,

original: lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang // de bzhin mtshan mo mar me dang // mchod pa ci nus ci dga' bya //🔽mtshams gcad phyogs bcing srung ba rnams //
analyzed: lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang // de bzhin mtshan mo mar me dang // mchod pa ci nus ci dga' bya // mtshams gcad phyogs bcing srung ba rnams //
translated: and likewise, at night, with lamps.🔽One should always ward off the directions

original: rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya //
analyzed: rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya //
translated: with the vajra hook.

original: de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la //
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la //
translated: One who is always diligent in this way

original: de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub //
analyzed: de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub //
translated: will succeed in six months.

original: de nas 'dod chags la sogs dang // sman chen mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas 'dod chags la sogs dang // sman chen mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur //
translated: Then, one should visualize the great medicine, passion, and so forth.🔽One should tell all the stories of the illnesses and medicines,

original: nad dang sman kun ston pa dang // gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur //🔽sgrub pa po la legs nyes rnams //
analyzed: nad dang sman kun ston pa dang // gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur // sgrub pa po la legs nyes rnams //
translated: and one should speak

original: tshig gis ston cing smra bar byed //
analyzed: tshig gis ston cing smra bar byed //
translated: with words that indicate what is good and bad for the practitioner.

original: gsang sngags de'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: gsang sngags de'i cho ga ni /
translated: The ritual of this mantra

original: 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di yin te /
translated: is as follows:

original: ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs bris te /
analyzed: ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs bris te /
translated: One should draw the image of the Blessed One and Vajrapāṇi on undamaged cloth, with undiminished colors.🔽The goddess should be depicted bowing at the feet of the Blessed One.

original: lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te /
analyzed: lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te /
translated: One should begin on the first day of the waxing moon.

original: @234b zas su 'o ma dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o //
analyzed: @234b zas su 'o ma dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o //
translated: For food, he should eat milk and a gruel of flour. He should recite the mantra eight hundred times three times a day, each time while holding a jasmine flower. He should strike Vajrapāṇi.

original: bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas zla ba nya'i nub mo brgyad stong gis bsnun la ci 'byor pas mchod na 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas zla ba nya'i nub mo brgyad stong gis bsnun la ci 'byor pas mchod na 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: He should also always make offerings to the Blessed One and Vajrapāṇi. Finally, having fasted for three days, he should strike [the image] eight thousand times on the night of the full moon. If he makes offerings to the best of his ability, he will be successful.

original: don thams cad ston par byed do //
analyzed: don thams cad ston par byed do //
translated: He will reveal all things.

original: gzhan yang tshes bcu gnyis nas brtsams te nya'i bar du gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par byas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshes bcu gnyis nas brtsams te nya'i bar du gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par byas te /
translated: Moreover, beginning on the twelfth day of the month until the full moon, he should be clean and controlled.

original: ras la bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / lha mo dang / sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyen la 'brir bcug ste sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de /
analyzed: ras la bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / lha mo dang / sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyen la 'brir bcug ste sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de /
translated: Having had painted on a cloth the Blessed One, Vajrapāṇi, the goddesses, and the practitioners, he should make offerings in front of the Blessed One at a stūpa containing relics. Having enchanted 800 jasmine flowers 800 times with the mantra, he should divide them into five heaps.

original: de rnams las cha gcig bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams las cha gcig bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: One part of them should be offered to the Blessed One.

original: lhag ma rnams ni /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni /
translated: The remainder

original: phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o //
translated: should be scattered in the four directions.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las kha cig blangs te ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las kha cig blangs te ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken some of those offered to the Blessed One, he should wrap them in a white cloth, place them on his pillow, and go to sleep.

original: 'o me dang / phye'i lde gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang / dri dkar po phul na /
analyzed: 'o me dang / phye'i lde gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang / dri dkar po phul na /
translated: Eating milk, flour gruel, and white food, and offering white flowers and white perfume,

original: zla @235a *// ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla @235a *// ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will be successful on the full moon day.

original: de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste /
analyzed: de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste /
translated: Then, on any day,

original: cho ga de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te mchod pa byas la /
analyzed: cho ga de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te mchod pa byas la /
translated: one should recite the mantra eight hundred times over eight hundred jasmine flowers, make offerings,

original: lhag ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na /
analyzed: lhag ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na /
translated: and scatter the leftovers as before.

original: rmi lam du thams cad ston par byed do //
analyzed: rmi lam du thams cad ston par byed do //
translated: If one goes to sleep, she will show everything in one’s dream.

original: cho ga gsum pa ni /
analyzed: cho ga gsum pa ni /
translated: The third rite:

original: me long la bsgrub par bya'o; ;mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
analyzed: me long la bsgrub par bya'o; ;mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
translated: One should practice in front of a mirror. The rite of the knowledge-mantra of Mahākāla is complete.

original: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: na mashtsanda badzra bra ni sya /
analyzed: na mashtsanda badzra bra ni sya /
translated: Homage to Caṇḍa-vajra-pāṇi,

original: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /
analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /
translated: Lord of the Great Yakṣa Assembly!

original: ae hye hi badzra p'a ni /🔽ai dam b'a ha na; ma nu sma ra sh'i ghram ma na tsa ba la li ta ga ti /
analyzed: ae hye hi badzra p'a ni / ai dam b'a ha na; ma nu sma ra sh'i ghram ma na tsa ba la li ta ga ti /
translated: Ehyehi, vajra-pāṇi!🔽Come, O Maṇu-smara, Śīghra-mana-cavala-līlā-gati!

analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti badzra p'a ni /

analyzed: he hi he hi he hi / hi hi / he ku ru he ku ru /
translated: Hi hi!🔽Kurur kurur!

original: ku ku ku ku /
analyzed: ku ku ku ku /
translated: Kukur kukur!

original: ku badzra p'a ni /
analyzed: ku badzra p'a ni /

original: sa ra sa ra /
analyzed: sa ra sa ra /
translated: Sarasarasa!

original: bee ri bee ri /
analyzed: bee ri bee ri /
translated: Vairaravira!

original: he hi he hi he hi /
analyzed: he hi he hi he hi /
translated: Hi hi hi hi hi hi!

original: ku ku bha ku ku bha /
analyzed: ku ku bha ku ku bha /
translated: kukubha kukubha

original: badzra p'a ni sv'ah'a /
analyzed: badzra p'a ni sv'ah'a /
translated: vajrapāṇi svāhā.

original: 'di ni / snying po spyan drang pa'o //🔽de la 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ni / snying po spyan drang pa'o // de la 'di ni /

original: lag na rdo rje'i snying po yin no //🔽sarbba tra aa pa ra dzi tam/
analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i snying po yin no // sarbba tra aa pa ra dzi tam/
translated: For that, this is the essence of Vajrapāṇi:🔽sarvatra aparājitaṃ

analyzed: sarba tra aa pra ti ha tam/

analyzed: sarba tra aartha s'a dha nam/

analyzed: aom dza te dzo gr'a ma n'am/ sva r'u pa mu pa darsha nam/

analyzed: ki li ki li /

analyzed: mo ku la shabd'a ru tam badzra tyu ta ka ra kri tyu ka ra na ra na dza nam/

analyzed: aad bh'a na siddhi pa ra ma siddhi /

analyzed: pushti ka ram/ sa b'a no pa ra darsham/ tsa ra dam/ sarbba karmma aartha s'a dha kam a'a karsha nam/

analyzed: badzra p'a ni sya / @235b bo la l'a pa nam/

original: badzra p'a ni sya /
analyzed: badzra p'a ni sya /

original: ha sa pa nam/🔽badzra pa ni sya /
analyzed: ha sa pa nam/ badzra pa ni sya /
translated: hasapaṇi🔽vajrapāṇi

original: pa ra ma hri da ya /
analyzed: pa ra ma hri da ya /
translated: paramahṛdaya

original: ai dam badzra p'a ni sya /
analyzed: ai dam badzra p'a ni sya /
translated: “O Vajrapāṇi!

original: badzra p'a ni ra ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti ra dzny'a pa ya ti badzre na /🔽ha na ti /
analyzed: badzra p'a ni ra ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti ra dzny'a pa ya ti badzre na / ha na ti /
translated: Vajrapāṇi, great yakṣa general, king, I pay homage to you!🔽Destroy!

analyzed: da ha ti / pa tsa ti tstshinda ti /

analyzed: tstshinda ti / bi dra ba ya ti / a'a lo ka bi lo kam ka ro ti /
translated: Look! Look!

original: hi li ni /
analyzed: hi li ni /
translated: Hili ni!

original: li mi li /
analyzed: li mi li /
translated: Limili!

original: ao au ho au bha badzra p'a ni /
analyzed: ao au ho au bha badzra p'a ni /
translated: Oṃ oṃ ho oṃ bhavavajrapāṇi!

original: hu ru hu ru /
analyzed: hu ru hu ru /
translated: Hurururu!

original: sam bam badzra b'anydza ye dushtana /
analyzed: sam bam badzra b'anydza ye dushtana /
translated: Samvara vajra, destroy the wicked!

original: ha na ha na /
analyzed: ha na ha na /
translated: Hāna hāna!

original: da ha da ha /
analyzed: da ha da ha /
translated: Dhaha dhaha!🔽Paca pacha!

original: pa tsa pa ce; grihna grihna /🔽bam shyam ka ro ha hi la ha l'a ya sv'ah'a /🔽hu lu hu l'a ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: pa tsa pa ce; grihna grihna / bam shyam ka ro ha hi la ha l'a ya sv'ah'a / hu lu hu l'a ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Graha graha!🔽Vamśya karo hi la lāya svāhā!🔽Huluhulāya svāhā!

original: hi li hi l'i ye sv'ah'a /🔽ka la ka l'a ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: hi li hi l'i ye sv'ah'a / ka la ka l'a ye sv'ah'a /
translated: Hili hilāya svāhā!🔽Kalakala-āyai svāhā!

original: ku li ku l'u ye sv'ah'a /🔽k'i li k'i la ye sv'ah'a /

translated: by one who is pure and skilled in the commitments.

original: thams cad rab tu 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad rab tu 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Everything will be accomplished.

original: rtsed mo can gyi snying po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rtsed mo can gyi snying po rdzogs so ////
translated: The essence of the playful one is complete.

original: de nas gtum po'i snying po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o; ;na ma:tsi li tsi ri ni /
analyzed: de nas gtum po'i snying po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o; ;na ma:tsi li tsi ri ni /
translated: Next, I will explain the extensive ritual of the essence of Caṇḍa:🔽Namaḥ cili ciliriṇi,

original: ai li ku ru had ti pra siddha bha ga to smi ku ru me ha ba ram ki li bi li /
analyzed: ai li ku ru had ti pra siddha bha ga to smi ku ru me ha ba ram ki li bi li /
translated: ili kurur hadati prasi-ddhabha-gavat oṃ kuru me va-ram kili vili,

original: hi ri ni su ru ku ru /
analyzed: hi ri ni su ru ku ru /
translated: hiri ni-suru kuru.

original: sa ma ya ma nu barta hri da ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sa ma ya ma nu barta hri da ye sv'ah'a /
translated: Samaya manubarta hṛdaya-ye svāhā.

original: snying po dran par byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der dga' bar gyur nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //🔽na ma:k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: snying po dran par byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der dga' bar gyur nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro // na ma:k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Wherever these words that remind one of the essence are recited, having become delighted, one will accomplish all activities.🔽Namaḥ kīlāya svāhā.

original: ma h'a k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: ma h'a k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /

original: kro dha k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: kro dha k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /

original: tsanda k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: tsanda k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /

original: de ba ti k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: de ba ti k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /

analyzed: badzra mo ta n'a ya sv'ah'a / badzra stam bha ya sv'ah'a /

analyzed: badzra pra bam dha n'a ya sv'ah'a / ai hi sti badzra /

analyzed: ae hi su sti badzra / ae hi pra ti ra badzra /

analyzed: ae hi aa pra ti ta ha badzra /

analyzed: mu ne mu ne mu ne /

original: su ma ti /
analyzed: su ma ti /

original: ae hi pa ni ti li /

original: ai dam gandha ma le /
analyzed: ai dam gandha ma le /

original: la la gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin; ;mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na ni //🔽nga yi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag /
analyzed: la la gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin; ;mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na ni // nga yi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag /
translated: Vajradhara in person,🔽he should perform this ritual

original: spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya //
analyzed: spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya //
translated: of inviting the supreme one.

original: dus gsum ba lang lci bas bskus //
analyzed: dus gsum ba lang lci bas bskus //
translated: He should anoint the three times with cow dung,🔽and with a pure mind and pure actions,🔽and with devotion to Vajradhara,

original: las kyang dag cing sems dag dang // rdo rje 'dzin la gus pa dang // rkang lag la sogs bkrus nas kyang //
analyzed: las kyang dag cing sems dag dang // rdo rje 'dzin la gus pa dang // rkang lag la sogs bkrus nas kyang //
translated: having washed his feet and hands,

original: dgon pa'am rang gi khyim yang rung //
analyzed: dgon pa'am rang gi khyim yang rung //
translated: in a secluded place or in his own house,

original: gtsang ma'i phyogs su mchod rten nam //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i phyogs su mchod rten nam //
translated: in a clean place, in front of a stūpa,

original: sku gzugs yang na sku gdung gi /
analyzed: sku gzugs yang na sku gdung gi /
translated: an image, or a relic,

original: mdun du rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /
analyzed: mdun du rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /
translated: he should always sit in meditation.

original: mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod pa yis //
analyzed: mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod pa yis //
translated: The person who practices cleanliness

original: bdug pa me tog la sogs pa //
analyzed: bdug pa me tog la sogs pa //
translated: should make offerings of incense, flowers, and so forth,

original: mchog dang khyad par 'phags pa yis //
analyzed: mchog dang khyad par 'phags pa yis //
translated: supreme and excellent,

original: dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya //🔽de la rab spro de la gus //
analyzed: dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya // de la rab spro de la gus //
translated: always at the three times.🔽He should be devoted to that, and should show

original: srog kyang de la bstan byas nas //
analyzed: srog kyang de la bstan byas nas //
translated: his devotion to that even at the cost of his life.

original: lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung //
translated: He should draw the form of Vajrapāṇi

original: ji skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri //
analyzed: ji skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri //
translated: as instructed, with all the characteristics.

original: dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis //
analyzed: dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis //
translated: With perfume, garlands, and ointments,🔽

original: rtag tu de la mchod par bya //🔽mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'//
analyzed: rtag tu de la mchod par bya // mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'//
translated: One should always make offerings to him🔽with incense, garlands, and ointments.🔽One should eat at the proper time with ghee,

original: sbrang rtsi 'o thug bza' bar bya //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi 'o thug bza' bar bya //

original: @239b ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan //
analyzed: @239b ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan //

original: rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug /
analyzed: rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug /
translated: and one should always sit facing east.

original: mar gyi mar me mi 'chi bas //
analyzed: mar gyi mar me mi 'chi bas //
translated: The ghee lamp should not be extinguished,

original: nyin par mchod pa legs par bya //
analyzed: nyin par mchod pa legs par bya //
translated: and one should make offerings during the day.

original: cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed dam //
analyzed: cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed dam //
translated: On the full moon of the month of miracles,

original: yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad la //
analyzed: yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad la //
translated: or on the eighth day of the waxing moon,

original: brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya //🔽yang na nyin re dus gsum du //
analyzed: brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya // yang na nyin re dus gsum du //
translated: one should begin and recite the mantra eight thousand times.🔽Alternatively, one should recite it eight hundred times

original: lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya //
translated: each day, three times.

original: thang chu yang ni bsreg par bya //
analyzed: thang chu yang ni bsreg par bya //
translated: One should also perform homa.

original: dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni //
analyzed: dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni //
translated: With a pure and one-pointed mind,

original: srung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: srung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya //
translated: one should recite the mantra, making it the supreme protection.

original: zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang //
analyzed: zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang //
translated: After a fortnight has passed,

original: des ni zhag gsum smyung ba byas //🔽mchod pa la sogs kun rgyas shing //
analyzed: des ni zhag gsum smyung ba byas // mchod pa la sogs kun rgyas shing //
translated: one should fast for three days.🔽Having made extensive offerings and so forth,

original: shin tu mang por byas nas kyang //
analyzed: shin tu mang por byas nas kyang //
translated: and having done a great deal,

original: 'dod pa yis la gzhag bya zhing //
analyzed: 'dod pa yis la gzhag bya zhing //
translated: And should be placed in the desired place.

original: de nas gus pa mchog gis su //
analyzed: de nas gus pa mchog gis su //
translated: Then, with the highest respect,🔽One should recite the thousand-syllable mantra.

original: aom ni tshig stong bzlas brjod bya; ;de nas rdo rje can yang mthong //🔽de la mchod sbyin gtso bo de //
analyzed: aom ni tshig stong bzlas brjod bya; ;de nas rdo rje can yang mthong // de la mchod sbyin gtso bo de //
translated: Then one will see the Vajra Holder,🔽And he will give the supreme gift

original: dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed //
analyzed: dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed //
translated: Of the highest sacred pledge.

original: sgrub pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas //
translated: Having invited him with the ritual of accomplishment,🔽One should request the supreme gift of whatever is desired.

original: mchod sbyin mchog la ci 'dod smos; ;tshig gis gang dang gang brjod pa'i //
analyzed: mchod sbyin mchog la ci 'dod smos; ;tshig gis gang dang gang brjod pa'i //
translated: Whatever words are spoken,

original: sgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the highest accomplishment.🔽Now I will explain

original: de yi slar gtang cho ga de //🔽rnam ba thams cad bshad par bya //
analyzed: de yi slar gtang cho ga de // rnam ba thams cad bshad par bya //
translated: The ritual for his return.🔽One should make prostrations and offerings,

original: des ni phyag dang mchod pa dang // mchod yon me tog la sogs dbul //
analyzed: des ni phyag dang mchod pa dang // mchod yon me tog la sogs dbul //
translated: And offer water for the feet, flowers, and so forth.

original: 'dod pa'i rig sngags lan gcig brjod //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rig sngags lan gcig brjod //
translated: Recite the desire mantra once,

original: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro /
translated: And then the Vajra Holder will depart.

original: na ma:hi li hu la /
analyzed: na ma:hi li hu la /
translated: Namaḥ hili hulu

original: ni li hu la /
analyzed: ni li hu la /
translated: Nili hulu

original: @240a *// aa ha ha ha ha ha /
analyzed: @240a *// aa ha ha ha ha ha /
translated: A ha ha ha ha

original: sa pra ti gatstsha tu bha ga b'am badzra p'a ni re tha su kham tsu lu tsu lu sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sa pra ti gatstsha tu bha ga b'am badzra p'a ni re tha su kham tsu lu tsu lu sv'ah'a /

original: 'di ni gcig gam gsum du brjod //
analyzed: 'di ni gcig gam gsum du brjod //
translated: This is said to be one, three,🔽Five, seven, twenty-one,

original: lnga 'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig ;brgya 'am yang na brgyad brgya 'am //
analyzed: lnga 'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig ;brgya 'am yang na brgyad brgya 'am //
translated: One hundred, or else eight hundred,

original: lan stong cho ga bzhin du brjod //
analyzed: lan stong cho ga bzhin du brjod //
translated: Or one thousand times, as prescribed.

original: 'byung po'i gnas sam gzhan dag tu //
analyzed: 'byung po'i gnas sam gzhan dag tu //
translated: In a place of spirits or elsewhere,

original: rdo rje dang ni lha yi mdun //
analyzed: rdo rje dang ni lha yi mdun //
translated: In front of the vajra and the deity,🔽One should recite the mantra🔽In combination with all the scents,

original: dri kun gyi ni sbyor ba dang; ;bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: dri kun gyi ni sbyor ba dang; ;bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya //
translated: In binding and in liberation.🔽In all the summoning and sending back,

original: dgug dang slar gtang thams cad dang // bcing dang grol ba thams cad la //
analyzed: dgug dang slar gtang thams cad dang // bcing dang grol ba thams cad la //
translated: In all the binding and liberating,

original: der ni lan gcig brjod par bya //
analyzed: der ni lan gcig brjod par bya //
translated: One should recite it just once.

original: des na rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro //
analyzed: des na rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro //
translated: Then the vajra holder will go.

original: 'di ni rtsed mo ldan pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni rtsed mo ldan pa yin //
translated: This is endowed with play,

original: sgrub dang slar gtang ba yang yin //
analyzed: sgrub dang slar gtang ba yang yin //
translated: And also with accomplishment and sending back.

original: 'di gnyis la ni khyad par du //
analyzed: 'di gnyis la ni khyad par du //
translated: In these two, in particular,

original: dbye bar bya ba mang po yod //
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba mang po yod //

translated: Then Vajrapāṇi, the lord of the yakṣa hosts, went to where the Blessed One was, draped his upper robe over one shoulder, and, with the utmost composure, sat down in front of the Blessed One, placing his right knee on the ground.

analyzed: btsugs nas mgo bo btud cing thal mo rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro //

original: 'jig rten gsum grags 'jig rten gyi //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum grags 'jig rten gyi //
translated: Is renowned in the three worlds.

original: rab kyi mchog gi gtso bo ste //
analyzed: rab kyi mchog gi gtso bo ste //
translated: It is the supreme, the best, the chief,

original: lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin //
translated: And is the vajra in the hand of the three.

original: 'di ga rten gsum mchog gtso bos kyang //
analyzed: 'di ga rten gsum mchog gtso bos kyang //
translated: Even the chief of the three worlds

original: 'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus //
analyzed: 'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus //
translated: Is unable to transgress it.

original: 'jig rten gsum mchog 'jig rten dbang //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum mchog 'jig rten dbang //
translated: The lord of the three worlds, the lord of the world,

original: tshangs pa la sogs snying po'i bar //
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs snying po'i bar //
translated: The essence of Brahmâ and so forth,

original: de yi sgrub pa de nyid de //
analyzed: de yi sgrub pa de nyid de //
translated: Is the very essence of its practice.

original: de yi las rnams rgyas pa yang //
analyzed: de yi las rnams rgyas pa yang //
translated: Its activities are also extensive,

original: rtsed mo can dang gtum po bzhin //
analyzed: rtsed mo can dang gtum po bzhin //
translated: Like that of Krodha and Krodha.

original: 'di yang de ltar bya ba ste //
analyzed: 'di yang de ltar bya ba ste //
translated: This should be done in the same way.

original: sgrub pa'i mdo tsam bshad bya na //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i mdo tsam bshad bya na //
translated: If I explain the essence of the practice,

original: gtsang ma'i mis ni gtsang ma'i phyogs //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i mis ni gtsang ma'i phyogs //
translated: The pure one should go to a pure place,

original: dri dang phreng ba byug pa rnams //
analyzed: dri dang phreng ba byug pa rnams //
translated: With scents, garlands, and ointments,

original: mchod dang khyad par 'phags pa yis //🔽mchod rten yang na sku gzugs @243a *//
analyzed: mchod dang khyad par 'phags pa yis // mchod rten yang na sku gzugs @243a *//
translated: And with the most excellent offerings,🔽One should worship the reliquary stupas

original: rnams; ;sku gdung ldan pa mchod par bya //
analyzed: rnams; ;sku gdung ldan pa mchod par bya //
translated: And the images of the Buddha.

original: rdo rje bris pa legs mchod nas //
analyzed: rdo rje bris pa legs mchod nas //
translated: Having made excellent offerings to the vajra drawings,

original: ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan //
analyzed: ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan //
translated: One should face west to the painted images.

original: yar gyi chos brgyad brtsams byas la //
analyzed: yar gyi chos brgyad brtsams byas la //
translated: One should begin the eight-day rite

original: sbrang rtsi 'o thug mar dang bcas //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi 'o thug mar dang bcas //
translated: And eat honey, milk, and butter

original: dus gsum za zhing rig sngags bzlas //
analyzed: dus gsum za zhing rig sngags bzlas //
translated: Three times a day, reciting the knowledge-mantra.

original: thang chu bzang po bsreg par bya //
analyzed: thang chu bzang po bsreg par bya //
translated: One should burn excellent myrobalan🔽And thoroughly wash the ashes,

original: lci ba sogs pa legs par bkru; ;dag pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug /🔽shin tu mnyam bzhag dus gsum du //
analyzed: lci ba sogs pa legs par bkru; ;dag pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug / shin tu mnyam bzhag dus gsum du //
translated: And sit facing east with a pure mind.🔽One should recite the mantra

original: lan grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: lan grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya //
translated: Eight hundred times in the three periods of the day.

original: de nas yid du 'ong ba yi //
analyzed: de nas yid du 'ong ba yi //
translated: Then, at the end, one should make

original: mchod pa las bzhin mjug tu bya //
analyzed: mchod pa las bzhin mjug tu bya //
translated: Delightful offerings as prescribed.

original: zla ba phyed ni 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: zla ba phyed ni 'das nas kyang //
translated: After half a month has passed,

original: nya yi nub mo spyan yang drang //
analyzed: nya yi nub mo spyan yang drang //
translated: On the night of the full moon, one should invite

original: lha yi gnas ni mthong ba des //
analyzed: lha yi gnas ni mthong ba des //
translated: The deity to be seen in the divine abode.

original: cho ga mchog gis bsrung bar bya; ;brgya rtsa brgyad ni brjod byas na //
analyzed: cho ga mchog gis bsrung bar bya; ;brgya rtsa brgyad ni brjod byas na //
translated: If one recites it one hundred and eight times,

original: de nas rdo rje can yang mthong //🔽de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyed //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje can yang mthong // de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyed //
translated: then one will also see the Vajra Holder.🔽Next, if one worships with devoted intent

original: ci ste gus pas 'dun pas mchod //
analyzed: ci ste gus pas 'dun pas mchod //
translated: for half a thousand days,🔽one will certainly see the Great Vajra Holder in person,

original: rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon sum du; ;mthong 'gyur de la the tshom med //🔽mchod sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon sum du; ;mthong 'gyur de la the tshom med // mchod sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des //
translated: there is no doubt about that.🔽That supreme and foremost offering

original: de la dam pa sbyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: de la dam pa sbyin par 'gyur //
translated: will grant the supreme boon to that person.

original: yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid //
analyzed: yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid //
translated: Or else, one will become a universal monarch,

original: 'dod pa gzhan la ci zhig smos //
analyzed: 'dod pa gzhan la ci zhig smos //
translated: to say nothing of other desired things.🔽The concluding rites,🔽as explained in the ritual,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang // ji skad bshad pa'i slar gtang dang // ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams kyang //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang // ji skad bshad pa'i slar gtang dang // ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams kyang //
translated: and the offerings as explained,

original: mjug tu legs par @243b bya ba yin //
analyzed: mjug tu legs par @243b bya ba yin //
translated: should be performed well.

original: 'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The ritual of the Dvādaśa-cakra is complete.

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha.

original: chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Dharma.

original: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Saṅgha.

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great lord of the yakṣa hosts, Vajrapāṇi.

original: gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni /
translated: The Setting

original: mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: In Śrāvastī.

original: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te dul ba mchog gis gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te dul ba mchog gis gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
translated: Then the great lord of the yakṣa hosts, Vajrapāṇi, draped his upper robe over one shoulder, knelt on his right knee, placed his palms together, and with the utmost humility said to the Blessed One,

original: gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag gis skye bo mang po sman pa'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags te /
analyzed: bdag gis skye bo mang po sman pa'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags te /
translated: I have explained my own essence to the world for the benefit of many beings.

original: bdag gi snying po ni /
analyzed: bdag gi snying po ni /
translated: My essence

original: 'di lags so //
analyzed: 'di lags so //
translated: is this.

original: gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na /
analyzed: gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na /
translated: If anyone summons me with this essence,

original: de'i thad du bdag myur du 'chi bar 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de'i thad du bdag myur du 'chi bar 'tshal lo //
translated: I will quickly die right there.

original: ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa las ma mchis na /
analyzed: ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa las ma mchis na /
translated: If I do not come when summoned with this essence,

original: 'jig rten la la mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la la mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchis par 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be reborn in the wombs of those who commit the five heinous crimes and create schisms in the saṃgha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na /
analyzed: zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na /
translated: if I am summoned by fasting for one day,

original: de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang du gsol /🔽lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yid tsam @244a *//
analyzed: de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang du gsol / lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yid tsam @244a *//
translated: please, Blessed One, release me from that.

original: 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Having said this, Vajrapāṇi, the Blessed One smiled slightly and said this:

original: lag na rdo rje /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje /
translated: “Vajrapāṇi,

original: legs so legs so //
analyzed: legs so legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent!🔽Since you have promised to the worlds, I am pleased with you.

original: khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes kyi; gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes kyi; gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po /
translated: Great lord of the assembly of yakṣas,

original: khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad pa ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad pa ma byed cig /
translated: go and do not despair!

original: de lta mod kyi /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi /
translated: However,

original: nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan bar ni /
analyzed: nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan bar ni /
translated: I also wish to hear your essence mantra.

original: 'dod do // de skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: 'dod do // de skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Thus he spoke.

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The great lord of the Yakṣa hosts, Vajrapāṇi, with his face slightly lowered, spoke with hesitation to the Blessed One:

original: bdag gi snying po cho ga dang bcas pa gsan du gsol /
analyzed: bdag gi snying po cho ga dang bcas pa gsan du gsol /
translated: “Please listen to my essence mantra with its ritual.

original: 'di sgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga' bas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zas su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu 'tshal te dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas khrus bgyis la /🔽gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug pa sreg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam /
analyzed: 'di sgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga' bas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zas su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu 'tshal te dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas khrus bgyis la / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug pa sreg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam /
translated: Desiring to accomplish this, and delighting in making offerings to the Blessed One, one should begin on the first day of the waxing phase, consuming milk and flour gruel, bathing three times a day with cow dung,

original: sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par bgyis la snying po brjod par bgyi ste /
analyzed: sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par bgyis la snying po brjod par bgyi ste /

original: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi thog mar bdag nyid srung bar bgyi'o; ;na mo ratna tra ya sya /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi thog mar bdag nyid srung bar bgyi'o; ;na mo ratna tra ya sya /
translated: At the beginning of these mantra words, one should protect oneself.

analyzed: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /

original: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /
analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /

original: shr'i mu aat tree bha /
analyzed: shr'i mu aat tree bha /

analyzed: snying po 'di ni /

analyzed: snga ma nyid de /

analyzed: ha ri ha ri ni /

analyzed: mum tsa dha /

analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

analyzed: na mo hi li mu li li mu badzra p'a ni tsu ru tsu ru /

analyzed: dzalpa dzalpa sv'ah'a /

analyzed: bdug pa de dag nyid shu dag dang sbyar bar bgyi'o //

original: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.🔽Hili hari vajrapāṇi bhati

original: hi li ha ri badzra p'a ni ba ti sya; siddha bhag smi sv'ah'a /
analyzed: hi li ha ri badzra p'a ni ba ti sya; siddha bhag smi sv'ah'a /

original: bdan dmar po phyar te dbul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdan dmar po phyar te dbul bar bgyi'o //

analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i snying po 'di ni / sems can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir las thams cad @246a *//
translated: This essence of Vajrapāṇi

original: byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa yin no //
translated: is for the happiness of all sentient beings and accomplishes all activities.

original: lag na rdo rje'i snying po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i snying po rdzogs so ////
translated: The essence of Vajrapāṇi is complete.

original: sngar bshad blon mo 'bar ba gang //
analyzed: sngar bshad blon mo 'bar ba gang //
translated: The blazing minister previously explained

original: de dag kun gyi mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: de dag kun gyi mchog gyur pa //
translated: is the supreme of all of them.🔽The blazing Vajrarati,

original: 'dod pa yi ni rdo rje ma; ;'bar ba de ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa yi ni rdo rje ma; ;'bar ba de ni bshad par bya //

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: lag na rdo rje dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo // gleng gzhi ni /
translated: Homage to Vajrapāṇi and Kāmeśvara.

original: mnyan du yod pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan du yod pa'o //
translated: The setting is Śrāvastī.

original: de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then Kāmeśvara, together with the knowledge-holders, went to where the Blessed One was, performed the knowledge-mantra in the presence of the Blessed One, and said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gi rig sngags kyi blon mo zhes bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bshad par 'tshal na /
analyzed: bdag gi rig sngags kyi blon mo zhes bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bshad par 'tshal na /
translated: I would like to explain in the presence of the Blessed One the one called the minister of my knowledge mantra.

original: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la sman par 'gyur ba dang / rtsed mo dang / las thams cad bgyid pa dang / las thams cad bsgrub pa'i slad du bzhes su gsol /
analyzed: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la sman par 'gyur ba dang / rtsed mo dang / las thams cad bgyid pa dang / las thams cad bsgrub pa'i slad du bzhes su gsol /
translated: Please accept it for the sake of benefiting the monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen, for the sake of all activities such as play, and for the sake of accomplishing all activities.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said,

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug /
translated: “Lord of Desire,

original: nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang; dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa dag yod de /
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang; dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa dag yod de /
translated: I have śrāvaka monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen who are attached.

original: de dag gi bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag gi bar du gcod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: This will be an obstacle for them.

original: thong zhig / de ltar 'dod pa'i @246b dbang phyug gis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: thong zhig / de ltar 'dod pa'i @246b dbang phyug gis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: Stop it!” In this way, the Lord of Desire made requests to the Blessed One up to three times.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa mchis pa de dag la rig sngags kyi rtsed mor 'gyur na /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa mchis pa de dag la rig sngags kyi rtsed mor 'gyur na /
translated: “Venerable One, if the Blessed One’s śrāvakas, monks and nuns, male and female lay practitioners, who are endowed with desire, were to engage in the play of knowledge mantras,

original: bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol /
analyzed: bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol /
translated: may the Blessed One accept them.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag tu zhabs 'bring na 'dug cing g-yon phyogs na gnas pa gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la gzigs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag tu zhabs 'bring na 'dug cing g-yon phyogs na gnas pa gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la gzigs so //
translated: Then the Blessed One looked at the yakṣa Vajrapāṇi, who was always attending on him and standing to his left.

original: de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the yakṣa Vajrapāṇi, having looked at the Blessed One, said this to Kāmeśvara:

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug /
translated: “Kāmeśvara,

original: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir rig sngags de shod cig shod cig /
analyzed: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir rig sngags de shod cig shod cig /
translated: recite that knowledge mantra for the benefit and happiness of many people!”

original: de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /🔽de'i tshe rig sngags 'di bshad do //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te / de'i tshe rig sngags 'di bshad do //
translated: Then, the lord of desire, delighted, pleased, and overjoyed,

original: syad ya the dan ai ti yo pa pa ti /
analyzed: syad ya the dan ai ti yo pa pa ti /

translated: and wishes for the bliss of the mind,🔽one should accomplish the very one

original: 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma nyid sgrub //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma nyid sgrub //
translated: who is the vajra of desire.🔽She always bestows bliss as one wishes,

original: rtag tu rang dgar bde pa sbyin; ;rang dgar 'gro ba'i gzhi yang yin //🔽rang dgar rtse zhing spyod pa yang //
analyzed: rtag tu rang dgar bde pa sbyin; ;rang dgar 'gro ba'i gzhi yang yin // rang dgar rtse zhing spyod pa yang //
translated: and is the basis for going as one wishes.🔽She is the one who plays and acts as she wishes,

original: 'chang ba la sogs rang dgar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'chang ba la sogs rang dgar 'gyur //
translated: and is the one who holds and so forth as she wishes.

original: 'di ni spro ba'i ngang can la //
analyzed: 'di ni spro ba'i ngang can la //
translated: This one is the one who is full of joy,

original: nam yang rgyab kyis phyogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: nam yang rgyab kyis phyogs mi 'gyur //
translated: And never turn away.

original: sgrub pa de yang 'joms mi byed //
analyzed: sgrub pa de yang 'joms mi byed //
translated: And that practice will not be destroyed.

original: 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur la //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur la //
translated: It will not be fruitless,

original: bgegs kyang byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgegs kyang byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And will not be obstructed.🔽If one violates the maṇḍala,🔽Or abandons the commitments,

original: dkyil 'khor las ni nyams gyur dang // dam tshigs dag kyang spangs pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin mchog sogs //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor las ni nyams gyur dang // dam tshigs dag kyang spangs pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin mchog sogs //
translated: Or has no faith in the buddhas, the supreme vajra-holders, and so forth,

original: ma dad rnams la 'grub mi 'gyur //🔽de phyir dkon mchog gsum po dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rig sngags rang gi bla ma la //
analyzed: ma dad rnams la 'grub mi 'gyur // de phyir dkon mchog gsum po dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rig sngags rang gi bla ma la //
translated: One will not be successful.🔽Therefore, with devotion, one should worship and practice🔽The Three Jewels,🔽And likewise the vajra-holders,

original: gus byas mchod cing bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: gus byas mchod cing bsgrub par bya //
translated: And one's own guru.

original: sgrub pa dag ni ma byas kyang //
analyzed: sgrub pa dag ni ma byas kyang //
translated: Even if one does not practice,

original: rtsa ba'i rig sngags stobs ldan pa //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rig sngags stobs ldan pa //
translated: The powerful root vidyā

original: las rnams stong dag 'grub byed pa //
analyzed: las rnams stong dag 'grub byed pa //
translated: Will accomplish a thousand deeds.

original: gang yin de dag shes par gyis //
analyzed: gang yin de dag shes par gyis //
translated: Know that!

original: kri ka ma la ka yi shing //
analyzed: kri ka ma la ka yi shing //
translated: The wood of the kṛkāla tree

original: yam sreg shing ni brgya rtsa brgyad //
analyzed: yam sreg shing ni brgya rtsa brgyad //
translated: Is the kindling, one hundred and eight pieces.

original: gtsang ma'i phyogs su me sbar te //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i phyogs su me sbar te //
translated: In a pure place, light the fire

original: cho ga dag ni rgyas par bya //
analyzed: cho ga dag ni rgyas par bya //
translated: And perform the extensive ritual.

original: zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du //
analyzed: zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du //
translated: For seven days, three times a day,

original: de bzhin bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya //🔽mar bcas 'o thug sbrang rtsir ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya // mar bcas 'o thug sbrang rtsir ldan //
translated: one should recite the mantra eight hundred times.🔽With ghee, milk, and honey,

original: me mchog sbyin sreg byas na ni //🔽'dis @250a *// ni rgyal po'am yang na ni //
analyzed: me mchog sbyin sreg byas na ni // 'dis @250a *// ni rgyal po'am yang na ni //
translated: one should perform the homa.🔽If by this one can enthrall a king

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang dbang gyur na //🔽rgyal srid dag la phan pa yi //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang dbang gyur na // rgyal srid dag la phan pa yi //
translated: or even a universal monarch,🔽what need is there to mention

original: rgyal po'i 'khor lta ci zhig smos //
analyzed: rgyal po'i 'khor lta ci zhig smos //
translated: the king’s retinue, who are beneficial to the kingdom?

original: lan tshva las ni gzugs byas nas //
analyzed: lan tshva las ni gzugs byas nas //
translated: Having made an effigy out of salt,

original: rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya //
translated: one should perform the homa starting from the feet.🔽By this rite, one will enthrall

original: cho ga des ni bud med dang // skyes pa dbang du 'gugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: cho ga des ni bud med dang // skyes pa dbang du 'gugs par 'gyur //
translated: women and men.🔽Having made an effigy of a maiden,

original: bu mo yi ni gzugs byas nas; ;rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: bu mo yi ni gzugs byas nas; ;rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya //
translated: one should perform the homa starting from the feet.🔽By this rite, one will enthrall

original: cho ga de nas bud med rnams //🔽dbang du bya ba bstan pa yin //🔽lo ma'i sbrang ma'i dpung byas nas //
analyzed: cho ga de nas bud med rnams // dbang du bya ba bstan pa yin // lo ma'i sbrang ma'i dpung byas nas //
translated: women.🔽Having made an army of leaf-insects,

original: yungs kar me tog bsregs pa yis //
analyzed: yungs kar me tog bsregs pa yis //
translated: one should burn mustard seeds and flowers.

original: de bzhin zhag bdun dus gsum du //
analyzed: de bzhin zhag bdun dus gsum du //
translated: In the same way, for seven days, three times a day,

original: rab tu bsgrims te mchod par bya //
analyzed: rab tu bsgrims te mchod par bya //
translated: one should make offerings with great concentration.

original: de ni yungs kar me tog gis //
analyzed: de ni yungs kar me tog gis //
translated: It is like a mustard seed flower.🔽

original: zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni //
analyzed: zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni //
translated: If one accomplishes it for seven days with mustard seeds,

original: lan bdun bzlas pa 'grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: lan bdun bzlas pa 'grub 'gyur te //
translated: one will succeed with seven recitations.

original: lo ma'i sbrang ma 'pho bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lo ma'i sbrang ma 'pho bar 'gyur //
translated: The bee will move to the leaf.

original: go cha dag ni mchog dang ni //
analyzed: go cha dag ni mchog dang ni //
translated: Having taken up the supreme armor

original: de bzhin manta ka blangs nas //
analyzed: de bzhin manta ka blangs nas //
translated: and likewise Mañjuśrī,

original: bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bzlas bya zhing //
analyzed: bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bzlas bya zhing //
translated: one should recite the mantra eight hundred times,

original: thog mar legs par mchod byas nas //
analyzed: thog mar legs par mchod byas nas //
translated: and first make excellent offerings.

original: gang gi ming ni brjod pa de //
analyzed: gang gi ming ni brjod pa de //
translated: Whoever's name one utters,

original: skad cig gis ni dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni dbang du 'gyur //
translated: they will be brought under control in an instant.

original: de bzhin cho ga byas nas ni //
analyzed: de bzhin cho ga byas nas ni //
translated: Likewise, having performed the ritual,🔽one should then take up Mañjuśrī,🔽and take fresh agarwood, sandalwood,

original: nanta ka ni phyi nas blangs; ;aa ga ru dang tsandan dang // ma ru pa ka rlon pa blang //
analyzed: nanta ka ni phyi nas blangs; ;aa ga ru dang tsandan dang // ma ru pa ka rlon pa blang //
translated: and marupa.

original: dri la sogs pa de dag gis //
analyzed: dri la sogs pa de dag gis //
translated: With those scents and so forth,

original: khrus byas skye bo thams cad dgra /
analyzed: khrus byas skye bo thams cad dgra /
translated: one should bathe, and all beings will be friendly.

original: thog mar mchod pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: thog mar mchod pa la sogs pa //
translated: First, one should make offerings and so forth,

original: @250b byed cing byed cing zhag bdun du //🔽dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: @250b byed cing byed cing zhag bdun du // dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya //
translated: and recite the mantra three times a day for seven days.

original: phyi nas mkhas pas khrus kyang bya //
analyzed: phyi nas mkhas pas khrus kyang bya //
translated: Afterwards, the wise one should also bathe.

original: mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la //
analyzed: mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la //
translated: On the fourteenth day of the waning phase,

original: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na; ;rgyal pos de la mchod par bya //🔽bong nga yi ni rtsa ba yang //
analyzed: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na; ;rgyal pos de la mchod par bya // bong nga yi ni rtsa ba yang //
translated: the king will make offerings to him.🔽One should dig up the root of the yellow myrobalan

original: byang phyogs blta zhing brko bar bya //🔽de nas de yi shun phrags ni //
analyzed: byang phyogs blta zhing brko bar bya // de nas de yi shun phrags ni //
translated: facing the north.

original: mar gyi ngo yi bcu bzhi la //
analyzed: mar gyi ngo yi bcu bzhi la //
translated: Then, on the fourteenth day of the waning fortnight,

original: phye mar byas nas bzlas brjod byas //
analyzed: phye mar byas nas bzlas brjod byas //
translated: one should grind it into powder and recite.

original: de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas nas ni //
analyzed: de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas nas ni //
translated: Likewise, having recited eight hundred times,

original: phur mar byas te bcang bar bya //
analyzed: phur mar byas te bcang bar bya //
translated: one should keep it as a charm.

original: bud med la ni der gtor na //
analyzed: bud med la ni der gtor na //
translated: If one scatters it on a woman,

original: de ma thag tu dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: de ma thag tu dbang du 'gyur //
translated: she will immediately come under one's control.

original: thams cad dbye bar bya ba ni //
analyzed: thams cad dbye bar bya ba ni //
translated: For all disputes,

original: nim pa'i yal ga bsreg bya zhing //
analyzed: nim pa'i yal ga bsreg bya zhing //
translated: one should burn nimba twigs

original: 'di dang 'di gnyis rtsod gyur cig /
analyzed: 'di dang 'di gnyis rtsod gyur cig /
translated: and recite, 'May these two quarrel.'

original: ces bya cho ga gsang ba yin //
analyzed: ces bya cho ga gsang ba yin //
translated: This is the secret ritual.

original: de las phyir gso dam pa ni //
analyzed: de las phyir gso dam pa ni //
translated: The supreme remedy for that

original: gsang sngags 'dis ni bkru bar bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'dis ni bkru bar bya //
translated: is to sprinkle with this mantra.

original: dri la sogs pas snying nas mchod //
analyzed: dri la sogs pas snying nas mchod //
translated: One should make offerings from the heart with perfume and so forth.

original: bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na ni //
analyzed: bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na ni //
translated: If one recites eight hundred times,

original: byad stems dgrol ba'i mchog yin te //
analyzed: byad stems dgrol ba'i mchog yin te //
translated: it is the supreme for releasing curses.

original: ci dga' bar ni brtsam bya zhing //
analyzed: ci dga' bar ni brtsam bya zhing //
translated: One should commence as one pleases.

original: zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni //
analyzed: zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni //
translated: If one accomplishes for seven days,

original: mi sod 'jigs med 'bar bar 'gyur //🔽kar na pi lu li gcig dang // ske tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshva dang // nim pa'i 'bru dang ras bal gyi //
analyzed: mi sod 'jigs med 'bar bar 'gyur // kar na pi lu li gcig dang // ske tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshva dang // nim pa'i 'bru dang ras bal gyi //
translated: one will be free from the fear of death and will blaze with splendor.🔽One should offer into the fire🔽karṇaplavā, mustard seed,

original: sa bon de dag sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: sa bon de dag sbyin sreg bya //
translated: salt, neem fruit, and cotton seed.

original: 'di nas gzhan du che ge mo //
analyzed: 'di nas gzhan du che ge mo //
translated: Saying, So-and-so, go elsewhere,

original: song zhig bros shig med gyur cig /
analyzed: song zhig bros shig med gyur cig /
translated: run away, be destroyed,🔽and uttering the name,

original: ces ni ming yang brjod byas na //
analyzed: ces ni ming yang brjod byas na //
translated: one should perform the rite.

original: 'gro 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: 'gro 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt that he will go.🔽If one wants to restore him

original: de las slar nas @251a *//🔽gso ba dang // bzhag par byas na lan bdun du //
analyzed: de las slar nas @251a *// gso ba dang // bzhag par byas na lan bdun du //
translated: and establish him again,

original: de la srung ba mchog byas na //
analyzed: de la srung ba mchog byas na //
translated: one should perform the supreme protection rite

original: gnas su dga' bar byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas su dga' bar byed par 'gyur //
translated: and he will be delighted in his abode.🔽With leaves of the banyan tree,🔽the bilva, the mango, and the āmalakī,

original: ba ta la yi lo ma dang // bil ba 'dzam bu aa mra dang // skyu ru ra la sogs pa yis //
analyzed: ba ta la yi lo ma dang // bil ba 'dzam bu aa mra dang // skyu ru ra la sogs pa yis //
translated: and so forth,

original: skal chung de ni khrus byas na //
analyzed: skal chung de ni khrus byas na //
translated: one should bathe the unfortunate one.

original: skal dang ldan par byed pa'i mchog /
analyzed: skal dang ldan par byed pa'i mchog /
translated: This is the supreme rite for endowing him with good fortune.

original: gos 'dod pa sha'i me tog rnams //
analyzed: gos 'dod pa sha'i me tog rnams //
translated: If one desires clothing, one should offer

original: sbyin sreg byas na gos rnams thob //
analyzed: sbyin sreg byas na gos rnams thob //
translated: If one performs a homa, one will obtain clothes.

original: hi ran ne mu li ki rnams //
analyzed: hi ran ne mu li ki rnams //
translated: If one performs a homa with hiranemukis,

original: sbyin sreg byas na dbyig rnams 'phel //🔽gser 'dod pas ni su barna //
analyzed: sbyin sreg byas na dbyig rnams 'phel // gser 'dod pas ni su barna //
translated: one’s wealth will increase.🔽One who desires gold should offer

original: tshul bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'thob; ;gser sgrub pa yi nang na ni //
analyzed: tshul bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'thob; ;gser sgrub pa yi nang na ni //
translated: a homa of gold particles.

original: cho ga 'di ni mchog tu bshad //
analyzed: cho ga 'di ni mchog tu bshad //
translated: This rite is said to be the best🔽among those for obtaining gold.

original: 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
translated: The rite of Kāmarāja is complete.

original: de nas rdo rje 'og pag can //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'og pag can //
translated: Next, the vajra-girdle

original: gnod sbyin rnams kyi snying po ste //
analyzed: gnod sbyin rnams kyi snying po ste //
translated: is the essence of the yakṣas.

original: 'phrog ma zhes kyang rab grags pa //
analyzed: 'phrog ma zhes kyang rab grags pa //
translated: It is also well-known as Hārītī,

original: 'bar ba de ni bshad par bya //🔽dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'bar ba de ni bshad par bya // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: and I will explain that blazing [mantra].🔽Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: gnod sbyin sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajrapāṇi, the lord of the yakṣa hosts, the three vajras!

original: gnod sbyin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the yakṣas!

original: lngas rtsen la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lngas rtsen la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Pañcika!

original: gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma rdo rje'i 'og pag can rigs thams cad dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma rdo rje'i 'og pag can rigs thams cad dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great yakṣiṇī Hārītī, the vajra-girdle, endowed with all the families!

original: de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'i /
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'i /
translated: Then, I will recite the essence mantras of all the yakshas.

original: khyed kun nga la nyon cig /
analyzed: khyed kun nga la nyon cig /
translated: All of you, listen to me!🔽If seen, they are the peaceful Amoghasiddhi,

original: mthong na @251b don yod zhi ba dang // gsum mchog blta na mi bzad dang // 'byung po thams cad rab zhi byed //
analyzed: mthong na @251b don yod zhi ba dang // gsum mchog blta na mi bzad dang // 'byung po thams cad rab zhi byed //
translated: the supreme three, the unbearable to behold, the pacifiers of all bhutas.

original: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
translated: Vajrapani, the great powerful one,

original: nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bu //
analyzed: nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bu //
translated: Vaisravana, the lord of wealth,

original: gnod sbyin kun gyi mnga' bdag rje //
analyzed: gnod sbyin kun gyi mnga' bdag rje //
translated: the sovereign lord of all yakshas,

original: gnod sbyin gang dag ri la gnas //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gang dag ri la gnas //
translated: the yakshas who dwell in the mountains,

original: sa ti ri dang ri bo che //
analyzed: sa ti ri dang ri bo che //
translated: the Satirisa and Mahirisa mountains,

original: zho gdong dang ni gdong rgyas dang // 'dod pa'i don sbyin gnod sbyin gang //
analyzed: zho gdong dang ni gdong rgyas dang // 'dod pa'i don sbyin gnod sbyin gang //
translated: the yakshas who grant desired meanings,

original: mtshon cha 'thab cha sna tshogs can //
analyzed: mtshon cha 'thab cha sna tshogs can //
translated: with various weapons and battle gear,🔽the powerful ones with great magical powers,🔽the Victorious Ones, the Completely Victorious Ones,🔽the White Lotus, the Foe Destroyer,

original: stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // padma dkar dang dgra 'joms dang // rgyan phreng rgyas dang rgyan phreng che; ;bdud rtsi snying rje nying rje grong //
analyzed: stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // padma dkar dang dgra 'joms dang // rgyan phreng rgyas dang rgyan phreng che; ;bdud rtsi snying rje nying rje grong //
translated: the Expansive Garland, the Great Garland,🔽the Nectar, the Compassionate, the Compassionate Village,

original: gnod sbyin chen po lngas rtsen dang // gnod sbyin na la ku be ra //
analyzed: gnod sbyin chen po lngas rtsen dang // gnod sbyin na la ku be ra //
translated: The yakṣa Nalakūbara,

original: nor bu'i sul can gnod sbyin gang //
analyzed: nor bu'i sul can gnod sbyin gang //
translated: And the yakṣa Maṇisikhin,🔽The one known as Maṇibhadra,

original: nor bu bzang zhes grags pa dang // rdzogs ldan dang ni rdzogs bzang dang // rab tu bzang dang bzang po nyid //
analyzed: nor bu bzang zhes grags pa dang // rdzogs ldan dang ni rdzogs bzang dang // rab tu bzang dang bzang po nyid //
translated: Pūrṇabhadra, Subhadra, and Bhadra,

original: bdag gi snying pos bkug pas na //
analyzed: bdag gi snying pos bkug pas na //
translated: Summoned by my essence mantra,

original: de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shig /
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shig /
translated: All of you, come here!🔽Those yakṣas not mentioned here,🔽Those who accomplish my aims,🔽Those who always act virtuously and beneficially,

original: ma smos gnod sbyin de dag dang // bdag gi don grub de dag dang // rtag tu dge dang phan byed dang // gnod sbyin gdon ni skyed byed dang // gnod sbyin mo ni 'phrog ma mo //
analyzed: ma smos gnod sbyin de dag dang // bdag gi don grub de dag dang // rtag tu dge dang phan byed dang // gnod sbyin gdon ni skyed byed dang // gnod sbyin mo ni 'phrog ma mo //
translated: Those who generate yakṣa spirits,🔽And the yakṣiṇī Hārītī,

original: bu mangs khyod ni 'dir shog cig /
analyzed: bu mangs khyod ni 'dir shog cig /
translated: Come here, you who have many children!

original: gzugs chen ldan zhing stobs che ba'i //
analyzed: gzugs chen ldan zhing stobs che ba'i //
translated: Your sons, endowed with great form and strength,

original: bu de dag kyang 'dir shog cig /
analyzed: bu de dag kyang 'dir shog cig /
translated: They too should come here!

original: khyod ni rtag tu gnod sbyin dang // bu yi 'khor dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: khyod ni rtag tu gnod sbyin dang // bu yi 'khor dang lhan cig tu //
translated: You, together with your retinue of yakṣa sons,

original: @252a *// lag na rdo rjes rab bskul bas //
analyzed: @252a *// lag na rdo rjes rab bskul bas //
translated: Urged on by Vajrapāṇi,

original: las rnams thams cad sgrub par gyis //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad sgrub par gyis //
translated: Accomplish all activities!

original: dgra yi phyogs dang mdza' bo'i phyogs //
analyzed: dgra yi phyogs dang mdza' bo'i phyogs //
